attributes.action: Murder of rape should result in death of the criminal.
attributes.additional_details: Rapist get let out with a few charges, yet that child or even adult is still petrified by the disgusting actions that have been upon them. These victims should feel safe walking out of their homes, instead the rapist or murderer is happy and does as they please, and the victim of rape, or a family member of the victim of murder is still at home never being able to forgive what that person did. A life for a life. Dogs get put down for biting folk, yet for raping a young child, nothing happens.
attributes.background: Nothing happens to those sick minded people who rape and destroy the lives of young people, yet the criminals just carry on happily in their lives, knowing they got away with it. Dogs get put down for biting folk, yet for raping a young child, nothing happens.
